description: Blackpool sign Middlesbrough winger Sammy Silvera on loan until the end of the season.
title: Sammy Silvera: Blackpool sign Middlesbrough winger on loan
title_page: Sammy Silvera: Blackpool sign Middlesbrough winger on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Blackpool have signed Middlesbrough winger Sammy Silvera on loan until the end of the season.
The 24-year-old joined Portsmouth on a season-long loan deal in July but Boro have cut it short to send him to the League One side instead.
The England-born Australia international could make his debut for the Seasiders against promotion-chasing Huddersfield on Saturday.
